refnamediv.refpurpose: The provider factory support for applications

refentry.refsect1: Stability Level Stable, unless otherwise indicated

refsynopsisdiv.title: Synopsis

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: The ThunarxProviderFactory class allows applications to use Thunar plugins. It handles the loading of the installed extensions and instantiates providers for the application. For example, Thunar uses this class to access the installed extensions.

refsect2.title: ThunarxProviderFactory
refsect2.para: The ThunarxProviderFactory struct contains only private data. It should only be accessed with the methods described below.

refsect2.title: thunarx_provider_factory_get_default ()
refsect2.para: Returns a reference to the default ThunarxProviderFactory instance.
The caller is responsible to free the returned object using g_object_unref() when no longer needed.

listitem.simpara: a reference to the default ThunarxProviderFactory instance.

refsect2.title: thunarx_provider_factory_list_providers ()
refsect2.para: Returns all providers of the given type.
